channel.title: About on Dario Camargo

item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a Software Developer with solid experience in Go, Java, and Python, focused on building scalable, distributed systems with high availability and low latency.

I hold a degree in Control and Automation Engineering, a postgraduate certification in Go by Full Cycle, and I’m currently pursuing a postgraduate program in Java Architecture and Development at FIAP.
